ಶಮದಮಮುಖದಿವ್ಯರತ್ನವಾರಿಧಯೇ ।
ಶಮನಾಯ ಮೋಹವಿತತೇಃ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೪ ॥

For the conquest of hosts of delusions,
we salute sri Sadasivendra, who is like
Garuda(the king of birds) to the
Serpent of desires, and who is a
treasure trove of noble qualities like
mind-control and sense-control.

ನಮದಾತ್ಮಬೋಧದಾಯಾ-
ರಮತೇ ಪರಮಾತ್ಮತತ್ತ್ವಸೌಧಾಗ್ರೇ ।
ಸಮಬುದ್ಧಯೇಽಶ್ಮಹೇಮ್ನೋಃ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
treats stone and gold alike, and
bestows self-knowledge on those who
take refuge in Him, Himself revelling in
the lofty turrets of the edifice of self-
knowledge.

ಗಿಲಿತಾವಿದ್ಯಾಹಾಲಾ-
ಹಲಹತಪುರ್ಯಷ್ಟಕಾಯ ಬೋಧೇನ ।
ಮೋಹಾಂಧಕಾರರವಯೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೬ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who is like the Sun to the darkness of
delusion, and who, through self-
knowledge, destroys the subtle body
(linga sareera) by swallowing, as it
were, the 'haalahala' venom of neiscience.

ಶಮಮುಖಷಟ್ಕಮುಮುಕ್ಷಾ-
ವಿವೇಕವೈರಾಗ್ಯದಾನನಿರತಾಯ ।
ತರಸಾ ನತಜನತತಯೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೭ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
intent on quickly granting the four
essential qualifications fo Viveka
(discrimination), Vairaggya
(dispassion), the Hexad of Sama
(mind-control)etc, the Mumukshutva
(desire for liberation) to those who take
refuge in Him.

ಸಿದ್ಧಾಂತ ಕಲ್ಪವಲ್ಲೀ-
ಮುಖಕೃತಿಕರ್ತ್ರೇ ಕಪಾಲಿಭಕ್ತಿಕೃತೇ ।
ಕರತಲಮುಕ್ತಿಫಲಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೮ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who is the author of great works like
Siddhanta Kalpavalli, who is a
devotee of Lord Siva, and who holds
the fruit of liberation in His palm.

ತೃಣಪಂಕಲಿಪ್ತವಪುಷೇ
ತೃಣತೋಽಪ್ಯಧರಂ ಜಗದ್ವಿಲೋಕಯತೇ ।
ವನಮಧ್ಯವಿಹರಣಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಗಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೯ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
who wanders inside forests, whose
body is smeared with mud and grass,
and who considers the universe as
even more trivial than grass.

ನಿಗೃಹೀತಹೃದಯಹರಯೇ
ಪ್ರಗೃಹೀತಾತ್ಮಸ್ವರೂಪರತ್ನಾಯ ।
ಪ್ರಣತಾಬ್ಧಿಪೂರ್ಣಶಶಿನೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೦ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who has
subdued the monkey of His heart, who
has in His hand the precious gem of
self-realisation, and who is like the full
moon to the ocean of devotees.

ಅಜ್ಞಾನತಿಮಿರರವಯೇ
ಪ್ರಜ್ಞಾನಾಮ್ಭೋಧಿಪೂರ್ಣಚನ್ದ್ರಾಯ ।
ಪ್ರಣತಾಘವಿಪಿನಶುಚಯೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
the sun to the darkness of ignorance,
the full moon to the ocean of self-
knowledge, and fire to the forest of sins
of those who have surrendered to Him.

ಮತಿಮಲಮೋಚನದಕ್ಷ-
ಪ್ರತ್ಯಗ್ಬ್ರಹ್ಮೈಕ್ಯದಾನನಿರತಾಯ ।
ಸ್ಮೃತಿಮಾತ್ರತುಷ್ಟಮನಸೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
adept in cleansing the sullied intellect
and granting the knowledge of the
unity of the individual soul and
Brahman, and is pleased at even a thought of Him.

ನಿಜಗುರುಪರಮಶಿವೇಂದ್ರ-
ಶ್ಲಾಘಿತವಿಜ್ಞಾನಕಾಷ್ಠಾಯ ।
ನಿಜತತ್ತ್ವನಿಶ್ಚಲಹೃದೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೩ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
mind is totally tranquil because of self-
realisation, and who got the
appreciation of His Guru, Sri
Paramashivendra for attaining the limit
of knowledge.

ಪ್ರವಿಲಾಪ್ಯ ಜಗದಶೇಷಂ
ಪರಿಶಿಷ್ಟಾಖಣ್ಡವಸ್ತುನಿರತಾಯ ।
ಆಸ್ಯಪ್ರಾಪ್ತಾನ್ನಭುಜೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೪ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
who, having mentally dissolved the
entire universe, is immersed in the
residual 'Atma Tatwa', and who
contentedly part takes of only food that
comes His way.

ಉಪಧಾನೀಕೃತಬಾಹುಃ
ಪರಿರಬ್ಧವಿರಕ್ತಿರಾಮೋ ಯಃ ।
ವಸನೀಕೃತಖಾಯಾಸ್ಮೈ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೫ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who, enjoying the embrace of
dispassion, reposes, having His arm
for a pillow and space for His garment.

ಸಕಲಾಗಮಾಂತಸಾರ-
ಪ್ರಕಟನದಕ್ಷಾಯ ನಮ್ರಪಕ್ಷಾಯ ।
ಸಚ್ಚಿತ್ಸುಖರೂಪಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೬ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
adept at revealing the essence of all
the scriptures, is by the side of those
who bow to Him, and is of the nature of
Existence-Consciousness-Bliss.

ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಾಶಿಕ್ಷಣಚತುರ-
ವ್ಯಾಹಾರಾಯ ಪ್ರಭೂತಕರುಣಾಯ ।
ವೀಕ್ಷಾಪಾವಿತಜಗತೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೭ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
whose utterances can teach
sweetness to sweet grapes, who has
abundant compassion, and whose
glance itself sanctifies the world.

ಯೋಽನುತ್ಪನ್ನವಿಕಾರೋ
ಬಾಹೌ ಮ್ಲೇಚ್ಛೇನ ಚ್ಛಿನ್ನಪತಿತೇಽಪಿ ।
ಅವಿದಿತಮಮತಾಯಾಸ್ಮೈ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ।। ೧೮ ।।

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who had no feeling of 'mine', and who
experienced no mental perturbation
whatsoever even when a wicked man
cut His arm away.

ನ್ಯಪತನ್ಸುಮಾನಿ ಮೂರ್ಧನಿ
ಯೇನೋಚ್ಚರಿತೇಷು ನಾಮಸೂಗ್ರಸ್ಯ ।
ತಸ್ಮೈ ಸಿದ್ಧವರಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೧೯ ॥

Whenever he uttered the names of
Lord Siva, there would be a shower of
flowers from the heavens. To such a
Siddha par excellence, Sri
Sadasivendra, we submit
our salutations.

ಯಃ ಪಾಪಿನೋಽಪಿ ಲೋಕಾಂ-
ಸ್ತರಸಾ ಪ್ರಕರೋತಿ ಪುಣ್ಯನಿಷ್ಠಾಗ್ರ್ಯಾನ್ ।
ಕರುಣಾಂಬುರಾಶಯೇಽಸ್ಮೈ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ।। ೨೦ ।।

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
the veritable ocean of mercy, who
transforms even sinners into the
foremost among virtuous ones.

ಸಿದ್ಧೇಶ್ವರಾಯ ಬುದ್ಧೇಃ
ಶುದ್ಧಿಪ್ರದಪಾದಪದ್ಮನಮನಾಯ ।
ಬದ್ಧೌಘಮೋಚಕಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೧ ॥

Salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
the king of Siddhas, who grants purity of
mind to those who bow at His lotus
feet, and liberates hosts of men in
bondage.

ಹೃದ್ಯಾಯ ಲೋಕವಿತತೇಃ
ಪದ್ಯಾವಲಿದಾಯ ಜನ್ಮಮೂಕೇಭ್ಯಃ ।
ಪ್ರಣತೇಭ್ಯಃ ಪದಯುಗಲೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
dear to the heart of multitudes, and
who grants poetic ability to even those
born dumb, who fall at His pair of feet.

ಜಿಹ್ವೋಪಸ್ಥರತಾನ-
ಪ್ಯಾಹೋಚ್ಚಾರೇಣ ಜಾತು ನೈಜಸ್ಯ ।
ಕುರ್ವಾಣಾಯ ವಿರಕ್ತಾ-
ನ್ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೩ ॥

The mere utterance of His name
converts those revelling in the senses
into ones established in dispassion.
We salute Him, Sri Sadasivendra.

ಕಮನೀಯಕವನಕರ್ತ್ರೇ
ಶಮನೀಯಭಯಾಪಹಾರಚತುರಾಯ ।
ತಪನೀಯಸದೃಶವಪುಷೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೪ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
body is as resplendent as molten gold,
who is an expert allayer of the fear of
death, and who is the creator of
enchanting poetry.

ತಾರಕವಿದ್ಯಾದಾತ್ರೇ
ತಾರಾಪತಿಗರ್ವವಾರಕಾಸ್ಯಾಯ ।
ತಾರಜಪಪ್ರವಣಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
gives knowledge that enables one to
cross the ocean of transmigratory
existence, whose face surpasses the
moon in beauty, and who is adept at
chanting the Omkara.

ಮೂಕೋಽಪಿ ಯತ್ಕೃಪಾ ಚೇ-
ಲ್ಲೋಕೋತ್ತರಕೀರ್ತಿರಾಶು ಜಾಯೇತ ।
ಅದ್ಭುತಚರಿತಾಯಾಸ್ಮೈ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ।। ೨೬ ।।

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
life story is a source of wonderment,
and whose grace can catapult even a
mute person into world renown.

ದುರ್ಜನದೂರಾಯತರಾಂ
ಸಜ್ಜನಸುಲಭಾಯ ಪಾತ್ರಹಸ್ತಾಯ ।
ತರುತಲನಿಕೇತನಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೭ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
the farthest removed from the wicked,
is easily accessible to the good, whose
cupped hands serve as the only vessel
He possesses, and whose abode is
the foot of a tree.

ಭವಸಿಂಧುತಾರಯಿತ್ರೇ
ಭವಭಕ್ತಾಯ ಪ್ರಣಮ್ರವಶ್ಯಾಯ ।
ಭವಬಂಧವಿರಹಿತಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೨೮ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who had
no bondage of Samsara, and makes
others cross the ocean of Samsara,
who is an ardent devotee of Lord
Bhava (Siva), and who is at the
ommand of His true devotees.

ತ್ರಿವಿಧಸ್ಯಾಪಿ ತ್ಯಾಗಂ
ವಪುಷಃ ಕರ್ತುಂ ಸ್ಥಲತ್ರಯೇ ಯ ಇವ ।
ಅಕರೋತ್ಸಮಾಧಿಮಸ್ಮೈ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ।। ೨೯ ।।

We submit our obeisance to Sri
Sadasivendra, who sat in
Samadhi in three places simultaneously (Nerur,
Manamadurai and Kasi) for
renouncing the three bodies (the
gross, the subtle and the causal).

ಕಾಮಿನಮಪಿ ಜಿತಹೃದಯಂ
ಕ್ರೂರಂ ಶಾಂತಂ ಜಡಂ ಸುಧಿಯಮ್ ।
ಕುರುತೇ ಯತ್ಕರುಣಾಸ್ಮೈ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೦ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
whose compassion makes a sensuous
person self-controlled, a cruel person
serene and a dullard highly intelligent.

ವೇದಸ್ಮೃತಿಸ್ಥವಿದ್ವ-
ಲಕ್ಷಣಲಕ್ಷ್ಯೇಷು ಸಂದಿಹಾನಾನಾಮ್ ।
ನಿಶ್ಚಯಕೃತೇ ವಿಹರ್ತ್ರೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
roams about clearing the doubts of
people regarding scriptural
descriptions of the characteristics and
goals of realised ones.

ಬಾಲಾರುಣನಿಭವಪುಷೇ
ಲೀಲಾನಿರ್ಧೂತಕಾಮಗರ್ವಾಯ ।
ಲೋಲಾಯ ಚಿತಿ ಪರಸ್ಯಾಂ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
body is resplendent as the rising sun,
who destroys Cupid's pride as if in play.
and who is established in the Supreme
Consciousness.

ಶರಣೀಕೃತಾಯ ಸುಗುಣೈ-
ಶ್ಚರಣೀಕೃತರಕ್ತಪಂಕಜಾತಾಯ ।
ಧರಣೀಸಹಕ್ಕ್ಷಮಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೩ ॥

All noble qualities have taken refuge in
Him, as it were, and it is as though He
has adopted red lotuses as His feet.
To such a one, Sri Sadasivendra, who
equals the Earth in forbearance, we
offer our salutations.

ಪ್ರಣತಾಯ ಯತಿವರೇಣ್ಯೈ-
ರ್ಗಣನಾಥೇನಾಪ್ಯಹಾರ್ಯವಿಘ್ನಹೃತೇ ।
ಗುಣದಾಸೀಕೃತಜಗತೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೪ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
saluted by the best of ascetics, who
removes obstacles that cannot be
removed even by Lord Vighneshwara,
and whose noble qualities have made
the entire world subservient to Him.

ಸಹಮಾನಾಯ ಸಹಸ್ರಾ-
ಣ್ಯಪ್ಯಪರಾಧಾನ್ ಪ್ರಣಮ್ರಜನರಚಿತಾನ್ ।
ಸಹಸೈವ ಮೋಕ್ಷದಾತ್ರೇ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
forgives even thousands of offences
committed by those who bow to Him,
and who gives liberation instantly.

ಧೃತದೇಹಾಯ ನತಾವಲಿ-
ತೂರ್ಣಪ್ರಜ್ಞಾಪ್ರದಾನವಾಂಛಾತಃ ।
ಶ್ರೀದಕ್ಷಿಣವಕ್ತ್ರಾಯ
ಪ್ರಣತಿಂ ಕುರ್ಮಃ ಸದಾಶಿವೇಂದ್ರಾಯ ॥ ೩೬ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
verily Lord Dakshinamurthi, who has
taken a human form owing to His
desire to grant self-knowledge quickly
to those who surrender to Him.

ತಾಪತ್ರಯಾರ್ತಹೃದಯ-
ಸ್ತಾಪತ್ರಯಹಾರದಕ್ಷನಮನಮಹಮ್ ।
ಗುರುವರಬೋಧಿತಮಹಿಮಾ
ಶರಣಂ ಯಾಸ್ಯೇ ತವಾಂಘ್ರಿಕಮಲಯುಗಮ್ ॥ ೩೭ ॥

Having a heart tormented by the three
kinds of miseries (viz. adhyaatma,
aadhibhowtika and aadhidaivika), and
having come to know of Your
greatness through the pre-eminent
Guru, I surrender at Your pair of lotus
feet, that destroy the miseries of those
who bow to You.

ಸದಾತ್ಮನಿ ವಿಲೀನಹೃತ್ಸಕಲವೇದಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಾರ್ಥವಿತ್
ಸರಿತ್ತಟವಿಹಾರಕೃತ್ಸಕಲಲೋಕಹೃತ್ತಾಪಹೃತ್ ।
ಸದಾಶಿವಪದಾಂಬುಜಪ್ರಣತಲೋಕಲಭ್ಯ ಪ್ರಭೋ
ಸದಾಶಿವಯತೀಟ್ ಸದಾ ಮಯಿ ಕೃಪಾಮಪಾರಾಂ ಕುರು ॥ ೩೮ ॥

O Lord! Your heart is always immersed
in the Atman. You are well-versed in
the scriptures and their meanings. You
destroy the afflictions in the hearts of
all. You roam the banks of rivers, and
are accessible to those who bow to the
lotus feet of Lord Siva. O Sadasiva, the
Lord of ascetics! Shower Your limitless
compassion on Me.

ಪುರಾ ಯವನಕರ್ತನಸ್ರವದಮಂದರಕ್ತೋಽಪಿ ಯಃ
ಪುನಃ ಪದಸರೋರುಹಪ್ರಣತಮೇನಮೇನೋನಿಧಿಮ್ ।
ಕೃಪಾಪರವಶಃ ಪದಂ ಪತನವರ್ಜಿತಂ ಪ್ರಾಪಯ-
ತ್ಸದಾಶಿವಯತೀಟ್ ಸ ಮಯ್ಯನವಧಿಂ ಕೃಪಾಂ ಸಿಞ್ಚತು ॥ ೩೯ ॥

Out of His extreme compassion, Sri
Sadasiva granted liberation to the
wicked man, a veritable repository of
all sins when he remorsefully fell at the
Sage's lotus feet after causing profuse
bleeding by cutting off His arm. May
that Lord of ascetics shower His
limitless compassion on Me.

ಹೃಷೀಕಹತಚೇತಸಿ ಪ್ರಹೃತದೇಹಕೇ ರೋಗಕೈ-
ರನೇಕವೃಜಿನಾಲಯೇ ಶಮದಮಾದಿಗನ್ಧೋಜ್ಝಿತೇ ।
ತವಾಂಘ್ರಿಪತಿತೇ ಯತೌ ಯತಿಪತೇ ಮಹಾಯಾಂಗಿರಾಟ್
ಸದಾಶಿವ ಕೃಪಾಂ ಮಯಿ ಪ್ರಕುರು ಹೇತುಶೂನ್ಯಾಂ ದ್ರುತಮ್ ॥ ೪೦ ॥

O Lord of great yogin-s! I, who am the
abode of numerous sins, an ascetic
with a heart tormented by the senses,
with a body afflicted by disease, and
without even a trace of noble qualities
like mind-control and sense-control,
have fallen at Your feet. O Protector of
ascetics! Shower Your unconditional
compassion on Me.

ನ ಚಾಹಮತಿಚಾತುರೀರಚಿತಶಬ್ದಸಂಘೈಃ ಸ್ತುತಿಂ
ವಿಧಾತುಮಪಿ ಚ ಕ್ಷಮೋ ನ ಚ ಜಪಾದಿಕೇಽಪ್ಯಸ್ತಿ ಮೇಂ |
ಬಲಂ ಬಲವತಾಂ ವರ ಪ್ರಕುರು ಹೇತುಶೂನ್ಯಾಂ ವಿಭೋ
ಸದಾಶಿವ ಕೃಪಾಂ ಮಯಿ ಪ್ರವರ ಯೋಗಿನಾಂ ಸತ್ವರಮ್ ॥ ೪೧ ॥

O Sadasiva, the greatest of yogis! O
strongest of the strong! O omnipresent
one! Quickly bestow unconditional
compassion on Me, who has no ability
to sing Your praises with brilliant
words, or the strength for japa, etc.

ಶಬ್ದಾರ್ಥವಿಜ್ಞಾನಯುತಾ ಹಿ ಲೋಕೇ
ವಸಂತಿ ಲೋಕಾ ಬಹವಃ ಪ್ರಕಾಮಮ್ ।
ನಿಷ್ಟಾಯುತಾ ನ ಶ್ರುತದೃಷ್ಟಪೂರ್ವಾ
ವಿನಾ ಭವಂತಂ ಯತಿರಾಜ ನೂನಮ್ ॥ ೪೨ ॥

In this world there are any number of
people who have the knowledge of the
scriptural utterances. But, O king
among ascetics! Other than You, there
is certainly none seen or heard of, who
is established in the import of the
scriptures.

ಸ್ತೋಕಾರ್ಚನಪ್ರೀತಹೃದಂಬುಜಾಯ
ಪಾಕಾಬ್ಜಚೂಡಾಪರರೂಪಧರ್ತ್ರೇ ।
ಶೋಕಾಪಹರ್ತ್ರೇ ತರಸಾ ನತಾನಾಂ
ಪಾಕಾಯ ಪುಣ್ಯಸ್ಯ ನಮೋ ಯತೀಶೇ ॥ ೪೩ ॥

Salutations to the king of ascetics,
whose heart is well-pleased even with
a little worship, who quickly removes
the miseries of those who bow to Him,
who is the fruit of all merits, and who is
but another form of the Lord, who
wears the crescent moon (Lord Siva).

ನಾಹಂ ಹೃಷೀಕಾಣಿ ವಿಜೇತುಮೀಶೋ
ನಾಹಂ ಸಪರ್ಯಾಭಜನಾದಿ ಕರ್ತುಮ್ ।
ನಿಸರ್ಗಯಾ ತ್ವಂ ದಯಯೈವ ಪಾಹಿ
ಸದಾಶಿವೇಮಂ ಕರುಣಾಪಯೋಧೇ ॥ ೪೪ ॥

O Sadasiva! o ocean of mercy! With
compassion so natural to You, save
Me, who am incapable of controlling
My senses, and of performing any
worship.

ಕೃತಯಾನಯಾ ನತಾವಲಿ-
ಕೋಟಿಗತೇನಾತಿಮಂದಬೋಧೇನ ।
ಮುದಮೇಹಿ ನಿತ್ಯತೃಪ್ತ-
ಪ್ರವರ ಸ್ತುತ್ಯಾ ಸದಾಶಿವಾಶ್ವಾಶು ॥ ೪೫ ॥

O Sadasiva, the foremost among the
ever-contented! Be pleased quickly
with this hymn composed by this
extremely dull witted one, who is the
most insignificant of all Your devotees.
songs.lyrics_tam:
ஶ்ரீஸதாஶிவேந்த்ரஸ்தவ

வரமபயமுதாரஂ புஸ்தகஂ சாக்ஷஹாரஂ
மணிவலயமநோஜ்ஞை: பாணிபத்மைர்ததாநா ।
ஸிதவஸநலலாமா குந்தமுக்தாபிராமா
வஸது ஶஶிநிபாஸ்யா வாசி வாக்தேவதா ந: ॥

ஶ்ரீ ஸச்சிதாநந்தஶிவாபிநவ-
நஸிஂஹபாரத்யபிதாந்யதீந்த்ராந் ।
வித்யாநிதீந் மந்த்ரநிதீந் ஸதாத்மநிஷ்டாந்
பஜே மாநவஶம்புரூபாந் ॥

பாரதீகருணாபாத்ரஂ பாரதீபதபூஷணஂ ।
பாரதீபதமாரூடஂ பாரதீதீர்தமாஶ்ரயே ॥

புரதோ பவது கதாப்தி:
புரவைரிநிஷ்டமாநஸ: ஸோऽயஂ ।
பரமஶிவேந்த்ரகராம்புஜஸஞ்ஜாதோ ய:
ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ரோ மே ॥

பரதத்த்வலீநமநஸே
ப்ரணமத்பவபந்தமோசநாயாஶு ।
ப்ரகடிதபரதத்த்வாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra (Sadasiva
Brahmendral), whose mind is
immersed in the Supreme Truth, who
reveals the ultimate reality and
immediately liberates one from the
shackles of transmigratory existence
to those who take refuge in Him

பரமஶிவேந்த்ரகராம்புஜ-
ஸஂபூதாய ப்ரணம்ரவரதாய ।
பததூதபங்கஜாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
feet surpass the lotus in beauty, who
grants the wishes of those who
surrender to Him, and who is the
disciple of Sri Paramasivendra

விஜநநதீகுஞ்ஜகஹே
மஞ்ஜுலபுலிநைகமஞ்ஜுதரதல்பே ।
ஶயநஂ குர்வாணாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
reclines on the pleasant bed made of
lovely sands in the bowers of lonely
river-banks.

காமாஹித்விஜபதயே
ஶமதமமுகதிவ்யரத்நவாரிதயே ।
ஶமநாய மோஹவிததேஃ
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௪ ॥

For the conquest of hosts of delusions,
we salute sri Sadasivendra, who is like
Garuda(the king of birds) to the
Serpent of desires, and who is a
treasure trove of noble qualities like
mind-control and sense-control.

நமதாத்மபோததாயா-
ரமதே பரமாத்மதத்த்வஸௌதாக்ரே ।
ஸமபுத்தயேऽஶ்மஹேம்நோஃ
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
treats stone and gold alike, and
bestows self-knowledge on those who
take refuge in Him, Himself revelling in
the lofty turrets of the edifice of self-
knowledge.

கிலிதாவித்யாஹாலா-
ஹலஹதபுர்யஷ்டகாய போதேந ।
மோஹாந்தகாரரவயே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௬ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who is like the Sun to the darkness of
delusion, and who, through self-
knowledge, destroys the subtle body
(linga sareera) by swallowing, as it
were, the 'haalahala' venom of neiscience.

ஶமமுகஷட்கமுமுக்ஷா-
விவேகவைராக்யதாநநிரதாய ।
தரஸா நதஜநததயே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௭ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
intent on quickly granting the four
essential qualifications fo Viveka
(discrimination), Vairaggya
(dispassion), the Hexad of Sama
(mind-control)etc, the Mumukshutva
(desire for liberation) to those who take
refuge in Him.

ஸித்தாந்தகல்பவல்லீ-
முககதிகர்த்ரே கபாலிபக்திகதே ।
கரதலமுக்திபலாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௮ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who is the author of great works like
Siddhanta Kalpavalli, who is a
devotee of Lord Siva, and who holds
the fruit of liberation in His palm.

தணபங்கலிப்தவபுஷே
தணதோऽப்யதரஂ ஜகத்விலோகயதே ।
வநமத்யவிஹரணாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்கஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௯ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
who wanders inside forests, whose
body is smeared with mud and grass,
and who considers the universe as
even more trivial than grass.

நிகஹீதஹதயஹரயே
ப்ரகஹீதாத்மஸ்வரூபரத்நாய ।
ப்ரணதாப்திபூர்ணஶஶிநே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௦ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who has
subdued the monkey of His heart, who
has in His hand the precious gem of
self-realisation, and who is like the full
moon to the ocean of devotees.

அஜ்ஞாநதிமிரரவயே
ப்ரஜ்ஞாநாம்போதிபூர்ணசந்த்ராய ।
ப்ரணதாகவிபிநஶுசயே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
the sun to the darkness of ignorance,
the full moon to the ocean of self-
knowledge, and fire to the forest of sins
of those who have surrendered to Him.

மதிமலமோசநதக்ஷ-
ப்ரத்யக்ப்ரஹ்மைக்யதாநநிரதாய ।
ஸ்மதிமாத்ரதுஷ்டமநஸே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
adept in cleansing the sullied intellect
and granting the knowledge of the
unity of the individual soul and
Brahman, and is pleased at even a thought of Him.

நிஜகுருபரமஶிவேந்த்ர-
ஶ்லாகிதவிஜ்ஞாநகாஷ்டாய ।
நிஜதத்த்வநிஶ்சலஹதே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௩ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
mind is totally tranquil because of self-
realisation, and who got the
appreciation of His Guru, Sri
Paramashivendra for attaining the limit
of knowledge.

ப்ரவிலாப்ய ஜகதஶேஷஂ
பரிஶிஷ்டாகண்டவஸ்துநிரதாய ।
ஆஸ்யப்ராப்தாந்நபுஜே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௪ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
who, having mentally dissolved the
entire universe, is immersed in the
residual 'Atma Tatwa', and who
contentedly part takes of only food that
comes His way.

உபதாநீகதபாஹுஃ
பரிரப்தவிரக்திராமோ யஃ ।
வஸநீகதகாயாஸ்மை
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௫ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who, enjoying the embrace of
dispassion, reposes, having His arm
for a pillow and space for His garment.

ஸகலாகமாந்தஸார-
ப்ரகடநதக்ஷாய நம்ரபக்ஷாய ।
ஸச்சித்ஸுகரூபாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௬ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
adept at revealing the essence of all
the scriptures, is by the side of those
who bow to Him, and is of the nature of
Existence-Consciousness-Bliss.

த்ராக்ஷாஶிக்ஷணசதுர-
வ்யாஹாராய ப்ரபூதகருணாய ।
வீக்ஷாபாவிதஜகதே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௭ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
whose utterances can teach
sweetness to sweet grapes, who has
abundant compassion, and whose
glance itself sanctifies the world.

யோऽநுத்பந்நவிகாரோ
பாஹௌ ம்லேச்சேந ச்சிந்நபதிதேऽபி ।
அவிதிதமமதாயாஸ்மை
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ।। ௧௮ ।।

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who had no feeling of 'mine', and who
experienced no mental perturbation
whatsoever even when a wicked man
cut His arm away.

ந்யபதந்ஸுமாநி மூர்தநி
யேநோச்சரிதேஷு நாமஸூக்ரஸ்ய ।
தஸ்மை ஸித்தவராய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௧௯ ॥

Whenever he uttered the names of
Lord Siva, there would be a shower of
flowers from the heavens. To such a
Siddha par excellence, Sri
Sadasivendra, we submit
our salutations.

யஃ பாபிநோऽபி லோகாஂ-
ஸ்தரஸா ப்ரகரோதி புண்யநிஷ்டாக்ர்யாந் ।
கருணாம்புராஶயேऽஸ்மை
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ।। ௨௦ ।।

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
the veritable ocean of mercy, who
transforms even sinners into the
foremost among virtuous ones.

ஸித்தேஶ்வராய புத்தேஃ
ஶுத்திப்ரதபாதபத்மநமநாய ।
பத்தௌகமோசகாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௧ ॥

Salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
the king of Siddhas, who grants purity of
mind to those who bow at His lotus
feet, and liberates hosts of men in
bondage.

ஹத்யாய லோகவிததே:
பத்யாவலிதாய ஜந்மமூகேப்யஃ ।
ப்ரணதேப்யஃ பதயுகலே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
dear to the heart of multitudes, and
who grants poetic ability to even those
born dumb, who fall at His pair of feet.

जஜிஹ்வோபஸ்தரதாந-
ப்யாஹோச்சாரேண ஜாது நைஜஸ்ய ।
குர்வாணாய விரக்தா-
ந்ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௩ ॥

The mere utterance of His name
converts those revelling in the senses
into ones established in dispassion.
We salute Him, Sri Sadasivendra.

கமநீயகவநகர்த்ரே
ஶமநீயபயாபஹாரசதுராய ।
தபநீயஸதஶவபுஷே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௪ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
body is as resplendent as molten gold,
who is an expert allayer of the fear of
death, and who is the creator of
enchanting poetry.

தாரகவித்யாதாத்ரே
தாராபதிகர்வவாரகாஸ்யாய ।
தாரஜபப்ரவணாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
gives knowledge that enables one to
cross the ocean of transmigratory
existence, whose face surpasses the
moon in beauty, and who is adept at
chanting the Omkara.

மூகோऽபி யத்கபா சே-
ல்லோகோத்தரகீர்திராஶு ஜாயேத ।
அத்புதசரிதாயாஸ்மை
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ।। ௨௬ ।।

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
life story is a source of wonderment,
and whose grace can catapult even a
mute person into world renown.

துர்ஜநதூராயதராஂ
ஸஜ்ஜநஸுலபாய பாத்ரஹஸ்தாய ।
தருதலநிகேதநாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௭ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
the farthest removed from the wicked,
is easily accessible to the good, whose
cupped hands serve as the only vessel
He possesses, and whose abode is
the foot of a tree.

பவஸிந்துதாரயித்ரே
பவபக்தாய ப்ரணம்ரவஶ்யாய ।
பவபந்தவிரஹிதாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௨௮ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who had
no bondage of Samsara, and makes
others cross the ocean of Samsara,
who is an ardent devotee of Lord
Bhava (Siva), and who is at the
ommand of His true devotees.

த்ரிவிதஸ்யாபி த்யாகஂ
வபுஷஃ கர்துஂ ஸ்தலத்ரயே ய இவ ।
அகரோத்ஸமாதிமஸ்மை
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ।। ௨௯ ।।

We submit our obeisance to Sri
Sadasivendra, who sat in
Samadhi in three places simultaneously (Nerur,
Manamadurai and Kasi) for
renouncing the three bodies (the
gross, the subtle and the causal).

காமிநமபி ஜிதஹதயஂ
க்ரூரஂ ஶாந்தஂ ஜடஂ ஸுதியம் ।
குருதே யத்கருணாஸ்மை
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௦ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
whose compassion makes a sensuous
person self-controlled, a cruel person
serene and a dullard highly intelligent.

வேதஸ்மதிஸ்தவித்வ-
லக்ஷணலக்ஷ்யேஷு ஸந்திஹாநாநாம் ।
நிஶ்சயகதே விஹர்த்ரே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
roams about clearing the doubts of
people regarding scriptural
descriptions of the characteristics and
goals of realised ones.

பாலாருணநிபவபுஷே
லீலாநிர்தூதகாமகர்வாய ।
லோலாய சிதி பரஸ்யாஂ
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
body is resplendent as the rising sun,
who destroys Cupid's pride as if in play.
and who is established in the Supreme
Consciousness.

ஶரணீகதாய ஸுகுணை-
ஶ்சரணீகதரக்தபங்கஜாதாய ।
தரணீஸஹக்க்ஷமாய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௩ ॥

All noble qualities have taken refuge in
Him, as it were, and it is as though He
has adopted red lotuses as His feet.
To such a one, Sri Sadasivendra, who
equals the Earth in forbearance, we
offer our salutations.

ப்ரணதாய யதிவரேண்யை-
ர்கணநாதேநாப்யஹார்யவிக்நஹதே ।
குணதாஸீகதஜகதே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௪ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
saluted by the best of ascetics, who
removes obstacles that cannot be
removed even by Lord Vighneshwara,
and whose noble qualities have made
the entire world subservient to Him.

ஸஹமாநாய ஸஹஸ்ரா-
ண்யப்யபராதாந்ப்ரணம்ரஜநரசிதாந் ।
ஸஹஸைவ மோக்ஷதாத்ரே
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
forgives even thousands of offences
committed by those who bow to Him,
and who gives liberation instantly.

தததேஹாய நதாவலி-
தூர்ணப்ரஜ்ஞாப்ரதாநவாஞ்சாதஃ ।
ஶ்ரீதக்ஷிணவக்த்ராய
ப்ரணதிஂ குர்மஃ ஸதாஶிவேந்த்ராய ॥ ௩௬ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
verily Lord Dakshinamurthi, who has
taken a human form owing to His
desire to grant self-knowledge quickly
to those who surrender to Him.

தாபத்ரயார்தஹதய-
ஸ்தாபத்ரயஹாரதக்ஷநமநமஹம் ।
குருவரபோதிதமஹிமா
ஶரணஂ யாஸ்யே தவாங்கிகமலயுகம் ॥ ௩௭ ॥

Having a heart tormented by the three
kinds of miseries (viz. adhyaatma,
aadhibhowtika and aadhidaivika), and
having come to know of Your
greatness through the pre-eminent
Guru, I surrender at Your pair of lotus
feet, that destroy the miseries of those
who bow to You.

ஸதாத்மநி விலீநஹத்ஸகலவேதஶாஸ்த்ரார்தவி-
த்ஸரித்தடவிஹாரகத்ஸகலலோகஹத்தாபஹத் ।
ஸதாஶிவபதாம்புஜப்ரணதலோகலப்ய ப்ரபோ
ஸதாஶிவயதீட் ஸதா மயி கபாமபாராஂ குரு ॥ ௩௮ ॥

O Lord! Your heart is always immersed
in the Atman. You are well-versed in
the scriptures and their meanings. You
destroy the afflictions in the hearts of
all. You roam the banks of rivers, and
are accessible to those who bow to the
lotus feet of Lord Siva. O Sadasiva, the
Lord of ascetics! Shower Your limitless
compassion on Me.

புரா யவநகர்தநஸ்ரவதமந்தரக்தோऽபி யஃ
புநஃ பதஸரோருஹப்ரணதமேநமேநோநிதிம் ।
கபாபரவஶஃ பதஂ பதநவர்ஜிதஂ ப்ராபய-
த்ஸதாஶிவயதீட் ஸ மய்யநவதிஂ கபாஂ ஸிஞ்சது ॥ ௩௯ ॥

Out of His extreme compassion, Sri
Sadasiva granted liberation to the
wicked man, a veritable repository of
all sins when he remorsefully fell at the
Sage's lotus feet after causing profuse
bleeding by cutting off His arm. May
that Lord of ascetics shower His
limitless compassion on Me.

ஹஷீகஹதசேதஸி ப்ரஹததேஹகே ரோககை-
ரநேகவஜிநாலயே ஶமதமாதிகந்தோஜ்சிதே ।
தவாங்க்ரிபதிதே யதௌ யதிபதே மஹாயாஂகிராட்
ஸதாஶிவ கபாஂ மயி ப்ரகுரு ஹேதுஶூந்யாஂ த்ருதம் ॥ ௪௦ ॥

O Lord of great yogin-s! I, who am the
abode of numerous sins, an ascetic
with a heart tormented by the senses,
with a body afflicted by disease, and
without even a trace of noble qualities
like mind-control and sense-control,
have fallen at Your feet. O Protector of
ascetics! Shower Your unconditional
compassion on Me.

ந சாஹமதிசாதுரீரசிதஶப்தஸங்கைஃ ஸ்துதிஂ
விதாதுமபி ச க்ஷமோ ந ச ஜபாதிகேऽப்யஸ்தி மேஂ ।
பலஂ பலவதாஂ வர ப்ரகுரு ஹேதுஶூந்யாஂ விபோ
ஸதாஶிவ கபாஂ மயி ப்ரவர யோகிநாஂ ஸத்வரம் ॥ ௪௧ ॥

O Sadasiva, the greatest of yogis! O
strongest of the strong! O omnipresent
one! Quickly bestow unconditional
compassion on Me, who has no ability
to sing Your praises with brilliant
words, or the strength for japa, etc.

ஶப்தார்தவிஜ்ஞாநயுதா ஹி லோகே
வஸந்தி லோகா பஹவஃ ப்ரகாமம் ।
நிஷ்டாயுதா ந ஶ்ருததஷ்டபூர்வா
விநா பவந்தஂ யதிராஜ நூநம் ॥ ௪௨ ॥

In this world there are any number of
people who have the knowledge of the
scriptural utterances. But, O king
among ascetics! Other than You, there
is certainly none seen or heard of, who
is established in the import of the
scriptures.

ஸ்தோகார்சநப்ரீதஹதம்புஜாய
பாகாப்ஜசூடாபரரூபதர்த்ரே ।
ஶோகாபஹர்த்ரே தரஸா நதாநாஂ
பாகாய புண்யஸ்ய நமோ யதீஶே ॥ ௪௩ ॥

Salutations to the king of ascetics,
whose heart is well-pleased even with
a little worship, who quickly removes
the miseries of those who bow to Him,
who is the fruit of all merits, and who is
but another form of the Lord, who
wears the crescent moon (Lord Siva).

நாஹஂ ஹஷீகாணி விஜேதுமீஶோ
நாஹஂ ஸபர்யாபஜநாதி கர்தும் ।
நிஸர்கயா த்வஂ தயயைவ பாஹி
ஸதாஶிவேமஂ கருணாபயோதே ॥ ௪௪ ॥

O Sadasiva! o ocean of mercy! With
compassion so natural to You, save
Me, who am incapable of controlling
My senses, and of performing any
worship.

கதயாநயா நதாவலி-
கோடிகதேநாதிமந்தபோதேந ।
முதமேஹி நித்யதப்த-
ப்ரவர ஸ்துத்யா ஸதாஶிவாஶ்வாஶு ॥ ௪௫ ॥

O Sadasiva, the foremost among the
ever-contented! Be pleased quickly
with this hymn composed by this
extremely dull witted one, who is the
most insignificant of all Your devotees.
songs.lyrics_tel:
శ్రీసదాశివేన్ద్రస్తవ

వరమభయముదారం పుస్తకం చాక్షహారం
మణివలయమనోజ్ఞై: పాణిపద్మైర్దధానా ।
సితవసనలలామా కున్దముక్తాభిరామా
వసతు శశినిభాస్యా వాచి వాగ్దేవతా న: ॥

శ్రీ సచ్చిదానన్దశివాభినవ-
నృసింహభారత్యభిధాన్యతీన్ద్రాన్ ।
విద్యానిధీన్ మన్త్రనిధీన్ సదాత్మనిష్ఠాన్
భజే మానవశమ్భురూపాన్ ॥

భారతీకరుణాపాత్రం భారతీపదభూషణం ।
భారతీపదమారూఢం భారతీతీర్థమాశ్రయే ॥

పురతో భవతు కృతాబ్ధి:
పురవైరినిష్ఠమానస: సోఽయం ।
పరమశివేన్ద్రకరామ్బుజసఞ్జాతో య:
సదాశివేన్ద్రో మే ॥

పరతత్త్వలీనమనసే
ప్రణమద్భవబన్ధమోచనాయాశు ।
ప్రకటితపరతత్త్వాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra (Sadasiva
Brahmendral), whose mind is
immersed in the Supreme Truth, who
reveals the ultimate reality and
immediately liberates one from the
shackles of transmigratory existence
to those who take refuge in Him

పరమశివేన్ద్రకరామ్బుజ-
సంభూతాయ ప్రణమ్రవరదాయ ।
పదధూతపఙ్కజాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
feet surpass the lotus in beauty, who
grants the wishes of those who
surrender to Him, and who is the
disciple of Sri Paramasivendra

విజననదీకుఞ్జగృహే
మఞ్జులపులినైకమఞ్జుతరతల్పే ।
శయనం కుర్వాణాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
reclines on the pleasant bed made of
lovely sands in the bowers of lonely
river-banks.

కామాహిద్విజపతయే
శమదమముఖదివ్యరత్నవారిధయే ।
శమనాయ మోహవితతేః
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౪ ॥

For the conquest of hosts of delusions,
we salute sri Sadasivendra, who is like
Garuda(the king of birds) to the
Serpent of desires, and who is a
treasure trove of noble qualities like
mind-control and sense-control.

నమదాత్మబోధదాయా-
రమతే పరమాత్మతత్త్వసౌధాగ్రే ।
సమబుద్ధయేఽశ్మహేమ్నోః
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
treats stone and gold alike, and
bestows self-knowledge on those who
take refuge in Him, Himself revelling in
the lofty turrets of the edifice of self-
knowledge.

గిలితావిద్యాహాలా-
హలహతపుర్యష్టకాయ బోధేన ।
మోహాన్ధకారరవయే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౬ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who is like the Sun to the darkness of
delusion, and who, through self-
knowledge, destroys the subtle body
(linga sareera) by swallowing, as it
were, the 'haalahala' venom of neiscience.

శమముఖషట్కముముక్షా-
వివేకవైరాగ్యదాననిరతాయ ।
తరసా నతజనతతయే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౭ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
intent on quickly granting the four
essential qualifications fo Viveka
(discrimination), Vairaggya
(dispassion), the Hexad of Sama
(mind-control)etc, the Mumukshutva
(desire for liberation) to those who take
refuge in Him.

సిద్ధాన్తకల్పవల్లీ-
ముఖకృతికర్త్రే కపాలిభక్తికృతే ।
కరతలముక్తిఫలాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౮ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who is the author of great works like
Siddhanta Kalpavalli, who is a
devotee of Lord Siva, and who holds
the fruit of liberation in His palm.

తృణపఙ్కలిప్తవపుషే
తృణతోఽప్యధరం జగద్విలోకయతే ।
వనమధ్యవిహరణాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్గః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౯ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
who wanders inside forests, whose
body is smeared with mud and grass,
and who considers the universe as
even more trivial than grass.

నిగృహీతహృదయహరయే
ప్రగృహీతాత్మస్వరూపరత్నాయ ।
ప్రణతాబ్ధిపూర్ణశశినే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౦ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who has
subdued the monkey of His heart, who
has in His hand the precious gem of
self-realisation, and who is like the full
moon to the ocean of devotees.

అజ్ఞానతిమిరరవయే
ప్రజ్ఞానామ్భోధిపూర్ణచన్ద్రాయ ।
ప్రణతాఘవిపినశుచయే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
the sun to the darkness of ignorance,
the full moon to the ocean of self-
knowledge, and fire to the forest of sins
of those who have surrendered to Him.

మతిమలమోచనదక్ష-
ప్రత్యగ్బ్రహ్మైక్యదాననిరతాయ ।
స్మృతిమాత్రతుష్టమనసే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
adept in cleansing the sullied intellect
and granting the knowledge of the
unity of the individual soul and
Brahman, and is pleased at even a thought of Him.

నిజగురుపరమశివేన్ద్ర-
శ్లాఘితవిజ్ఞానకాష్ఠాయ ।
నిజతత్త్వనిశ్చలహృదే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౩ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
mind is totally tranquil because of self-
realisation, and who got the
appreciation of His Guru, Sri
Paramashivendra for attaining the limit
of knowledge.

ప్రవిలాప్య జగదశేషం
పరిశిష్టాఖణ్డవస్తునిరతాయ ।
ఆస్యప్రాప్తాన్నభుజే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౪ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
who, having mentally dissolved the
entire universe, is immersed in the
residual 'Atma Tatwa', and who
contentedly part takes of only food that
comes His way.

ఉపధానీకృతబాహుః
పరిరబ్ధవిరక్తిరామో యః ।
వసనీకృతఖాయాస్మై
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౫ ॥

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who, enjoying the embrace of
dispassion, reposes, having His arm
for a pillow and space for His garment.

సకలాగమాన్తసార-
ప్రకటనదక్షాయ నమ్రపక్షాయ ।
సచ్చిత్సుఖరూపాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౬ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
adept at revealing the essence of all
the scriptures, is by the side of those
who bow to Him, and is of the nature of
Existence-Consciousness-Bliss.

ద్రాక్షాశిక్షణచతుర-
వ్యాహారాయ ప్రభూతకరుణాయ ।
వీక్షాపావితజగతే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౭ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
whose utterances can teach
sweetness to sweet grapes, who has
abundant compassion, and whose
glance itself sanctifies the world.

యోఽనుత్పన్నవికారో
బాహౌ మ్లేచ్ఛేన చ్ఛిన్నపతితేఽపి ।
అవిదితమమతాయాస్మై
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ।। ౧౮ ।।

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
who had no feeling of 'mine', and who
experienced no mental perturbation
whatsoever even when a wicked man
cut His arm away.

న్యపతన్సుమాని మూర్ధని
యేనోచ్చరితేషు నామసూగ్రస్య ।
తస్మై సిద్ధవరాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౧౯ ॥

Whenever he uttered the names of
Lord Siva, there would be a shower of
flowers from the heavens. To such a
Siddha par excellence, Sri
Sadasivendra, we submit
our salutations.

యః పాపినోఽపి లోకాం-
స్తరసా ప్రకరోతి పుణ్యనిష్ఠాగ్ర్యాన్ ।
కరుణామ్బురాశయేఽస్మై
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ।। ౨౦ ।।

Our obeisance to Sri Sadasivendra,
the veritable ocean of mercy, who
transforms even sinners into the
foremost among virtuous ones.

సిద్ధేశ్వరాయ బుద్ధేః
శుద్ధిప్రదపాదపద్మనమనాయ ।
బద్ధౌఘమోచకాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౧ ॥

Salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
the king of Siddhas, who grants purity of
mind to those who bow at His lotus
feet, and liberates hosts of men in
bondage.

హృద్యాయ లోకవితతే:
పద్యావలిదాయ జన్మమూకేభ్యః ।
ప్రణతేభ్యః పదయుగలే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
dear to the heart of multitudes, and
who grants poetic ability to even those
born dumb, who fall at His pair of feet.

జిహ్వోపస్థరతాన-
ప్యాహోచ్చారేణ జాతు నైజస్య ।
కుర్వాణాయ విరక్తా-
న్ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౩ ॥

The mere utterance of His name
converts those revelling in the senses
into ones established in dispassion.
We salute Him, Sri Sadasivendra.

కమనీయకవనకర్త్రే
శమనీయభయాపహారచతురాయ ।
తపనీయసదృశవపుషే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౪ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
body is as resplendent as molten gold,
who is an expert allayer of the fear of
death, and who is the creator of
enchanting poetry.

తారకవిద్యాదాత్రే
తారాపతిగర్వవారకాస్యాయ ।
తారజపప్రవణాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
gives knowledge that enables one to
cross the ocean of transmigratory
existence, whose face surpasses the
moon in beauty, and who is adept at
chanting the Omkara.

మూకోఽపి యత్కృపా చే-
ల్లోకోత్తరకీర్తిరాశు జాయేత ।
అద్భుతచరితాయాస్మై
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ।। ౨౬ ।।

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
life story is a source of wonderment,
and whose grace can catapult even a
mute person into world renown.

దుర్జనదూరాయతరాం
సజ్జనసులభాయ పాత్రహస్తాయ ।
తరుతలనికేతనాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౭ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
the farthest removed from the wicked,
is easily accessible to the good, whose
cupped hands serve as the only vessel
He possesses, and whose abode is
the foot of a tree.

భవసిన్ధుతారయిత్రే
భవభక్తాయ ప్రణమ్రవశ్యాయ ।
భవబన్ధవిరహితాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౨౮ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who had
no bondage of Samsara, and makes
others cross the ocean of Samsara,
who is an ardent devotee of Lord
Bhava (Siva), and who is at the
ommand of His true devotees.

త్రివిధస్యాపి త్యాగం
వపుషః కర్తుం స్థలత్రయే య ఇవ ।
అకరోత్సమాధిమస్మై
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ।। ౨౯ ।।

We submit our obeisance to Sri
Sadasivendra, who sat in
Samadhi in three places simultaneously (Nerur,
Manamadurai and Kasi) for
renouncing the three bodies (the
gross, the subtle and the causal).

కామినమపి జితహృదయం
క్రూరం శాన్తం జడం సుధియమ్ ।
కురుతే యత్కరుణాస్మై
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౦ ॥

Our salutations to Sri Sadasivendra,
whose compassion makes a sensuous
person self-controlled, a cruel person
serene and a dullard highly intelligent.

వేదస్మృతిస్థవిద్వ-
లక్షణలక్ష్యేషు సన్దిహానానామ్ ।
నిశ్చయకృతే విహర్త్రే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౧ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
roams about clearing the doubts of
people regarding scriptural
descriptions of the characteristics and
goals of realised ones.

బాలారుణనిభవపుషే
లీలానిర్ధూతకామగర్వాయ ।
లోలాయ చితి పరస్యాం
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౨ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, whose
body is resplendent as the rising sun,
who destroys Cupid's pride as if in play.
and who is established in the Supreme
Consciousness.

శరణీకృతాయ సుగుణై-
శ్చరణీకృతరక్తపఙ్కజాతాయ ।
ధరణీసహక్క్షమాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౩ ॥

All noble qualities have taken refuge in
Him, as it were, and it is as though He
has adopted red lotuses as His feet.
To such a one, Sri Sadasivendra, who
equals the Earth in forbearance, we
offer our salutations.

ప్రణతాయ యతివరేణ్యై-
ర్గణనాథేనాప్యహార్యవిఘ్నహృతే ।
గుణదాసీకృతజగతే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౪ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
saluted by the best of ascetics, who
removes obstacles that cannot be
removed even by Lord Vighneshwara,
and whose noble qualities have made
the entire world subservient to Him.

సహమానాయ సహస్రా-
ణ్యప్యపరాధాన్ప్రణమ్రజనరచితాన్ ।
సహసైవ మోక్షదాత్రే
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౫ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who
forgives even thousands of offences
committed by those who bow to Him,
and who gives liberation instantly.

ధృతదేహాయ నతావలి-
తూర్ణప్రజ్ఞాప్రదానవాఞ్ఛాతః ।
శ్రీదక్షిణవక్త్రాయ
ప్రణతిం కుర్మః సదాశివేన్ద్రాయ ॥ ౩౬ ॥

We salute Sri Sadasivendra, who is
verily Lord Dakshinamurthi, who has
taken a human form owing to His
desire to grant self-knowledge quickly
to those who surrender to Him.

తాపత్రయార్తహృదయ-
స్తాపత్రయహారదక్షనమనమహమ్ ।
గురువరబోధితమహిమా
శరణం యాస్యే తవాఙ్గికమలయుగమ్ ॥ ౩౭ ॥

Having a heart tormented by the three
kinds of miseries (viz. adhyaatma,
aadhibhowtika and aadhidaivika), and
having come to know of Your
greatness through the pre-eminent
Guru, I surrender at Your pair of lotus
feet, that destroy the miseries of those
who bow to You.

సదాత్మని విలీనహృత్సకలవేదశాస్త్రార్థవి-
త్సరిత్తటవిహారకృత్సకలలోకహృత్తాపహృత్ ।
సదాశివపదామ్బుజప్రణతలోకలభ్య ప్రభో
సదాశివయతీట్ సదా మయి కృపామపారాం కురు ॥ ౩౮ ॥

O Lord! Your heart is always immersed
in the Atman. You are well-versed in
the scriptures and their meanings. You
destroy the afflictions in the hearts of
all. You roam the banks of rivers, and
are accessible to those who bow to the
lotus feet of Lord Siva. O Sadasiva, the
Lord of ascetics! Shower Your limitless
compassion on Me.

పురా యవనకర్తనస్రవదమన్దరక్తోఽపి యః
పునః పదసరోరుహప్రణతమేనమేనోనిధిమ్ ।
కృపాపరవశః పదం పతనవర్జితం ప్రాపయ-
త్సదాశివయతీట్ స మయ్యనవధిం కృపాం సిఞ్చతు ॥ ౩౯ ॥

Out of His extreme compassion, Sri
Sadasiva granted liberation to the
wicked man, a veritable repository of
all sins when he remorsefully fell at the
Sage's lotus feet after causing profuse
bleeding by cutting off His arm. May
that Lord of ascetics shower His
limitless compassion on Me.

హృషీకహతచేతసి ప్రహృతదేహకే రోగకై-
రనేకవృజినాలయే శమదమాదిగన్ధోజ్ఝితే ।
తవాఙ్ఘ్రిపతితే యతౌ యతిపతే మహాయాంగిరాట్
సదాశివ కృపాం మయి ప్రకురు హేతుశూన్యాం ద్రుతమ్ ॥ ౪౦ ॥

O Lord of great yogin-s! I, who am the
abode of numerous sins, an ascetic
with a heart tormented by the senses,
with a body afflicted by disease, and
without even a trace of noble qualities
like mind-control and sense-control,
have fallen at Your feet. O Protector of
ascetics! Shower Your unconditional
compassion on Me.

న చాహమతిచాతురీరచితశబ్దసఙ్ఘైః స్తుతిం
విధాతుమపి చ క్షమో న చ జపాదికేఽప్యస్తి మేం ।
బలం బలవతాం వర ప్రకురు హేతుశూన్యాం విభో
సదాశివ కృపాం మయి ప్రవర యోగినాం సత్వరమ్ ॥ ౪౧ ॥

O Sadasiva, the greatest of yogis! O
strongest of the strong! O omnipresent
one! Quickly bestow unconditional
compassion on Me, who has no ability
to sing Your praises with brilliant
words, or the strength for japa, etc.

శబ్దార్థవిజ్ఞానయుతా హి లోకే
వసన్తి లోకా బహవః ప్రకామమ్ ।
నిష్టాయుతా న శ్రుతదృష్టపూర్వా
వినా భవన్తం యతిరాజ నూనమ్ ॥ ౪౨ ॥

In this world there are any number of
people who have the knowledge of the
scriptural utterances. But, O king
among ascetics! Other than You, there
is certainly none seen or heard of, who
is established in the import of the
scriptures.

స్తోకార్చనప్రీతహృదమ్బుజాయ
పాకాబ్జచూడాపరరూపధర్త్రే ।
శోకాపహర్త్రే తరసా నతానాం
పాకాయ పుణ్యస్య నమో యతీశే ॥ ౪౩ ॥

Salutations to the king of ascetics,
whose heart is well-pleased even with
a little worship, who quickly removes
the miseries of those who bow to Him,
who is the fruit of all merits, and who is
but another form of the Lord, who
wears the crescent moon (Lord Siva).

నాహం హృషీకాణి విజేతుమీశో
నాహం సపర్యాభజనాది కర్తుమ్ ।
నిసర్గయా త్వం దయయైవ పాహి
సదాశివేమం కరుణాపయోధే ॥ ౪౪ ॥

O Sadasiva! o ocean of mercy! With
compassion so natural to You, save
Me, who am incapable of controlling
My senses, and of performing any
worship.

కృతయానయా నతావలి-
కోటిగతేనాతిమన్దబోధేన ।
ముదమేహి నిత్యతృప్త-
ప్రవర స్తుత్యా సదాశివాశ్వాశు ॥ ౪౫ ॥

O Sadasiva, the foremost among the
ever-contented! Be pleased quickly
with this hymn composed by this
extremely dull witted one, who is the
most insignificant of all Your devotees.

songs.title: Piba re rāma rasaṃ rasane by Śrī Sadāśivabrahmendra (Sanskrit)
songs.lyrics:
पिब रे राम रसं रसने

कोदण्डदीक्षागुरुम् अप्रमेयं
सलक्ष्मणं दाशरथिं दयालुम् ।
आजानुबाहुं जगदेकवीरम्
अनाथनाथं रघुनाथमीडे ॥

पिब रे राम रसं रसने ।

दूरीकृत पातक संसर्गं
पूरित नानाविध फल वर्गम् ॥ (पिब रे)

जनन मरण भय शोक विदूरं
सकल शास्त्र निगमागम सारम् ॥ (पिब रे)

परिपालित सरसिज गर्भाण्डं
परम पवित्रीकृत पाषण्डम् ॥ (पिब रे)

शुद्ध परम हंसाश्रम गितं
शुक शौनक कौशिक मुख पीतम् ॥ (पिब रे)
songs.lyrics_iast:
piba re rāma rasaṃ rasane

kodaṇḍadīkṣāguruṃ aprameyaṃ
salakṣmaṇaṃ dāśarathiṃ dayālum ।
ājānubāhuṃ jagadekavīraṃ
anāthanāthaṃ raghunāthamīḍe ॥

piba re rāma rasaṃ rasane ।

dūrīkṛta pātaka saṃsargaṃ
pūrita nānāvidha phala vargam ॥ (piba re)

janana maraṇa bhaya śoka vidūraṃ
sakala śāstra nigamāgama sāram ॥ (piba re)

paripālita sarasija garbhāṇḍaṃ
parama pavitrīkṛta pāṣaṇḍam ॥ (piba re)

śuddha parama haṃsāśrama gitaṃ
śuka śaunaka kauśika mukha pītam ॥ (piba re)
songs.lyrics_kan:
ಪಿಬ ರೇ ರಾಮ ರಸಂ ರಸನೇ

ಕೋದಂಡ ದೀಕ್ಷಾಗುರುಂ ಅಪ್ರಮೇಯಂ
ಸಲಕ್ಷ್ಮಣಂ ದಾಶರಥಿಂ ದಯಾಲುಮ್ ।
ಆಜಾನುಬಾಹುಂ ಜಗದೇಕವೀರಂ
ಅನಾಥನಾಥಂ ರಘುನಾಥಮೀಡೇ ॥

ಪಿಬ ರೇ ರಾಮ ರಸಂ ರಸನೇ ।

ದೂರೀಕೃತ ಪಾತಕ ಸಂಸರ್ಗಂ
ಪೂರಿತ ನಾನಾವಿಧ ಫಲ ವರ್ಗಮ್ ॥ (ಪಿಬ ರೇ)

ಜನನ ಮರಣ ಭಯ ಶೋಕ ವಿದೂರಂ
ಸಕಲ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರ ನಿಗಮಾಗಮ ಸಾರಮ್ ॥ (ಪಿಬ ರೇ)

ಪರಿಪಾಲಿತ ಸರಸಿಜ ಗರ್ಭಾಂಡಂ
ಪರಮ ಪವಿತ್ರೀಕೃತ ಪಾಷಂಡಮ್ ॥ (ಪಿಬ ರೇ)

ಶುದ್ಧ ಪರಮ ಹಂಸಾಶ್ರಮ ಗಿತಂ
ಶುಕ ಶೌನಕ ಕೌಶಿಕ ಮುಖ ಪೀತಮ್ ॥ (पिब रे)
songs.lyrics_tam:
பிப ரே ராம ரஸஂ ரஸநே

கோதண்டதீக்ஷாகுருஂ அப்ரமேயஂ
ஸலக்ஷ்மணஂ தாஶரதிஂ தயாலும் ।
ஆஜாநுபாஹுஂ ஜகதேகவீரஂ
அநாதநாதஂ ரகுநாதமீடே ॥

பிப ரே ராம ரஸஂ ரஸநே ।

தூரீகத பாதக ஸஂஸர்கஂ
पूरित नानाविध फल वर्गम् ॥ (பிப ரே)

ஜநந மரண பய ஶோக விதூரஂ
ஸகல ஶாஸ்த்ர நிகமாகம ஸாரம் ॥ (பிப ரே)

பரிபாலித ஸரஸிஜ கர்பாண்டஂ
பரம பவித்ரீகத பாஷண்டம் ॥ (பிப ரே)

ஶுத்த பரம ஹஂஸாஶ்ரம கிதஂ
ஶுக ஶௌநக கௌஶிக முக பீதம் ॥ (பிப ரே)
songs.lyrics_tel:
పిబ రే రామ రసం రసనే

కోదణ్డదీక్షాగురుం అప్రమేయం
సలక్ష్మణం దాశరథిం దయాలుమ్ ।
ఆజానుబాహుం జగదేకవీరం
అనాథనాథం రఘునాథమీడే ॥

పిబ రే రామ రసం రసనే ।

దూరీకృత పాతక సంసర్గం
పూరిత నానావిధ ఫల వర్గమ్ ॥ (పిబ రే)

జనన మరణ భయ శోక విదూరం
సకల శాస్త్ర నిగమాగమ సారమ్ ॥ (పిబ రే)

పరిపాలిత సరసిజ గర్భాణ్డం
పరమ పవిత్రీకృత పాషణ్డమ్ ॥ (పిబ రే)

శుద్ధ పరమ హంసాశ్రమ గితం
శుక శౌనక కౌశిక ముఖ పీతమ్॥ (పిబ రే)
